'''Gwenfin''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A trusted associate of [Dereo the Lean](/dereoTheLean/), Gwenfin was sent deep into the ruins of old Neketaka to find the treasure he's been hunting for.

If you showed [Dereo](/dereoTheLean/) the [Cornett of Depths](/cornettOfDepths/) in [The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/) and obtained the [other part](/cornettOfWaves/) from [Takano's Estate](/takanosEstate/) then proceeded with taking Ondra's treasure, Gwenfin will be in the Chamber of Waves in the Old City Ruins looking for it. 

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/): She helps you find the treasure. Somewhat. A bit.

'''Gwenfin''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A trusted associate of [[Dereo the Lean]], Gwenfin was sent deep into the ruins of old Neketaka to find the treasure he's been hunting for.

If you showed [[Dereo the Lean|Dereo]] the [[Cornett of Depths]] in [[The Cornett's Call]] and obtained the [[Cornett of Waves|other part]] from [[Takano's estate|Takano's Estate]] then proceeded with taking Ondra's treasure, Gwenfin will be in the Chamber of Waves in the Old City Ruins looking for it.
